WorkItem.Description:
I really missed old rawr. This rawr sux. No one bothers to develop. I recieve closure e-mails almost a year later.All  I want is working RAWR with protection paladin thats all. We missed you.

Gears, enchants, reforges are so out dated. You can"t even compete with mr ask robot. It is too sad :( . You guys were # 1 during LK!

Comments.Message:
Rawr is a community developed program.  Unfortunately we are currently short on developers.  If you would like to help develop, or know someone that can help, please have a read of [this](https://rawr.codeplex.com/discussions/472104) thread.  If you can't help us develop, please bear with us as we would love for some beta testers once things are back in swing.

With regards to the issue closure emails, that was just me cleaning up some very old issues that no longer apply to the current status of certain modules.

Anyway, thank you for the feedback.  We [the developers] would love to see Rawr back to its glory days of WotLK as well.
